text: I wish there was an API to interact with reporting dashboards, datasets, etc.

I wish dashboard reports were more printer-friendly.  Our clients always want to print reports but they only print what shows on the screen and cut off anything else.  I know we can export to Excel and print but they don't want that because it loses the look of the screen format.  I wish you could format column sizes and such but alas that is not possible right now.

Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.
